name: BoxMG4WRF
short_description:
This is a version of the Dendy-Moulton "Black Box Multigrid" elliptic equation solver (until a more permanent archive is established). It has been updated to allow single-precision solutions and is posted here for use with an upcoming release of WRF (Weather Research and Forecasting) model including storm electrification. Only runs under MPI at this time (i.e., no SMP/OpenMP support).

The code here is not actively developed and is provided solely for use with WRF to support the WRF_ELEC storm electrification option.

Supported architectures are Intel/AMD processors under Linux or OS X.
summary: The BoxMG elliptic equation solver for WRF
